colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES GANG DU 'GRO BA'I PHYOGS KYI YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD LHA NGO MI DO 'PHROD PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR DENG SANG YUL DUS KYI DBANG LAM SO SO'I 'DONG SPYAR GYI SGIR MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG SNANG BAS, ,@007B NGA BZOD 'BRING GOS PA MI 'DUG KYANG, GCIG TU PHYOGS 'GRO LTA BUR 'DRE RE DGOS PA BYUNG TSE YI GE MANG PO ZHAG BGLAGS KYANG LAM 'BREL MED DANG, PHAL CHEN SPYIR KHYAB PA MA ME ZHIG LAS SHING THOGS MDZUB, GU LTAR NA NANG THAG TU KHEL DES SHIG PI YOD 'DUG PAS DE 'DRAR PHAN PA SRID SNYAM NAS, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES ZAB RGYAS MANG PO MA BSRES SHING, MING GSAL GYI RIGS DON TE SKABS DON 'DOL BAR BKOD PA'O, DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GRAGS PAS, ,)
